channel.title: Dont Ask Noob Questions
channel.description:
I know this is the help section but, ive seen questions along the lines of "how do i make monsters drop stuff?" and "emote tab help, changing text". most of these can simply be answeared by looking in your client.java, and a fair amount of poeple use czar now, WICH HAS IT'S OWN FILE NAMED "Texthandler". I'm not saying these are bad questions, im saying these are spam. Also, most of these can be answeared by taking a quick look in the tuterial section. I'm just tired of when poeple who have good questions get put on to the 2nd page so fast because of spam questions. Really, before you post, please take a look in the tuterial section to see if your question can't be answeared there. Try taking a look in your server folder before anything. If you cant find anything, then post it in here.
thank you for veiwing ~red_rooster

Really, before you post, please take a look in the tuterial section to see if your question can’t be answeared there. Try taking a look in your server folder before anything. thank you for veiwing

Be vewy vewy quiet, I’m huntin’ stickies.[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @Volcom_T Volcom T
item.description:

s p i d a z:

Well said BUT! why does everyone say “coding” are you not “Programing”?

im a noob like kiwon said…

item.title: Dont Ask Noob Questions
item.dc:creator: @kiwon kiwon
item.description:
@kiwon wrote:

[quote=“Volcom T, post:3, topic:200691”]hey and you got to remember
they are new to java or coding so they mite ask stupid questions
and they can be new to mopar so they don’t know anything about spam
so they post away… but it is true they are getting worse as it gos.
so we help them so they don’t double post…[/quote]people who are new to mopar should at least learn the basics of java

we can’t lead them through every single fucking step

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:4, topic:200691”]Well said BUT! why does everyone say “coding” are you not “Programing”?[/quote]“noobs” call it coding

=][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2008, 11:03:13 PM[/size][hr][quote=“T-R-A-V-I-S, post:5, topic:200691”]yes, i did ask how to get npcs to drop items because that is a little bit difficult. i admit that. i know how to do pretty much everything else. but some people do ask completely dumb questions like what are kbd cords[/quote]it’s simple

add the ID, spawning coordinates, walking coordinates and your done

-.-

Read full topic
